document.full_text: president bashar al-assad said on saturday emergency law in place for almost 50 years in syria would be lifted by next week but ignored popular demands to curb the security apparatus and dismantle its authoritarian system.
document.title: syria's assad vows to lift emergency law by next week
lines_and_colors: president bashar al-assad said on saturday emergency law in place for almost 50 years in syria would be lifted by next week but ignored popular demands to curb the security apparatus and dismantle its authoritarian system.
